name: Warselyna
description:
'MADE FOR VIRTUS WINTER GAME JAM'

The last world war was the deadliest in history. But what is coming, will destroy the world as we knew it. All nuclear weaponry was launched, and the only chance that you have is to find a safe bunker.  And you, a girl called Vaselyna,  left alone in an occupied city, must find one of these bunkers or die trying.

Director - Marko Zahartovskyi

Programming - Marko Zahartovskyi

Modeling - Yana Kurlyak, Yaroslav Borys, Sophia Petryshyn

Animations - Yaroslav Borys

Sound - Yaroslav Borys

UI - Sophia Petryshyn

Level Design - Marko Zahartovskyi, Nazar Pasternak, Taras Rumezhak, Yana Kurlyak

We know about bugs and are trying to fix them)
